name: Hyperdrome
summary: Welcome to the futuristic sport of ‘Hyperdrome’ - hop into your gridpod and blast off into the arena. Capture precious jewels and equipment and attempt to score points by depositing them in your own goal. Obtain power ups to blast the enemy and steal possession of vital energy. Comlynx with up to three of your friends and play against each other in this hyper-speed futuristic sport.
